snippet: Sourced in contemporary dance and the street, “Pavement” twists together aggressive male posturing with the kind of hip-hop moves that summon comparisons to ballet.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews premiere of dance piece Pavement, choreographed and performed by Kyle Abraham at Harlem Stage Gatehouse.
lead_paragraph: Sourced in contemporary dance and the street, “Pavement” twists together aggressive male posturing with the kind of hip-hop moves that summon comparisons to ballet.

headline.print_headline: Hip-Hop Moves and Revolving Police Lights Illuminate a Flammable Scene
headline.seo: Kyle Abraham’s ‘Pavement,’ at Harlem Stage Gatehouse
headline.main: Hip-Hop Moves and Revolving Police Lights Illuminate a Flammable Scene
